title: Just got another team of people
body: Who think that the meta is law and breaking it is a reportable offense, I was in a norms and just wanted to have fun so I went enemy jg/roam instead of support and boy did the salt start to flow. My team yelling in all chat for me to be reported for trolling and intentional feeding when I was legitimately trying and had one of the better scores on my team. Of course at the end I got the usual stupidity of people thinking they could actually get me punished for this and of course I got the automated warning bs stuff but I know that even if I did get auto banned one quick message to support would see them realize it was just because of false reports. I have said it once and I'll say it again meta breaking isn't reportable I could go AD Ryze and roam the enemy jg all game as long as I am trying to win and using pings I ain't breaking any rules.
